release.action: User specific data for a layout is now stored in a separate LayoutInstance. This allows the sharing of layout tree.
CopletLayout only holds the coplet instance id instead of the object itself.
Refactor the object model: CopletBaseData has been renamed to CopletType, CopletData has been renamed to CopletDefinition and CopletInstanceData to CopletInstance.

Add Spring post processor to add all configured components implement the Receiver interface as subscribers to the event manager. This simplifies component development as the component itself does not need to register itself anymore. Remove the possibility to configure components or classes as receivers from the event manager.
Add CopletDecorationProvider which provides the information for the title bar of a coplet. A coplet adapter can optionally implement this interface.
Castor source converter can be configured using xconf instead of adding a castor.properties file to the classpath.
Unify coplet adapters: Caching is now supported by all adapters including the portlet and wsrp adapters. Therefore the caching-uri adapter has been removed.
Add deployment infrastructure.
Add static layout objects and implement maximize functionality for layouts.
Portal Service provides access to global configuration settings which can be used throughout the portal.
Add AJAX support.
Make coplet adapters accessible from portal component manager.
Add layout source to stream complete coplets/layouts.
Add temporary attributes to Layout objects.
Move Castor support into own package and support roles files for Castor. This makes including/excluding the Castor support easier.
Simplify object model by removing Producible. Clean up Castor mapping.
Remove the support for aspect data handling.
Tab events are now convertable.
The lifetime of encoded events is now the user session.
Remove aspect datas from layouts. Parameters are now used instead.
Add CopletInstanceDataFeatures and CopletDataFeatures utility classes to query optional features of coplets and to track changed coplets.
Refactor url creation for events (NOT FINISHED YET).
Remove aspect datas from coplet instance datas. Attributes are now used instead.
Remove AbstractUserProfileManager and AuthenticationProfileManager. Use GroupBasedProfileManager instead.
Add coplet size to coplet instance data. The size can be minimized, normal or full-screen. This removed the need for a special full screen handling.

Enable per sitemap configuration for portal applications and add several roles files for default configurations. Using per sitemap configurations and including the provided roles files make the configuration of the portal much easier.
Remove aspect datas from coplet datas. Attributes are now used instead.
Remove deprecated Publisher, Subscriber, Filter and Register.
Remove deprecated PortletPortalManager.
Initial creation.
